dmca.title: [ADMINS] URGENT SECOND DMCA Notice of re.http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ sent on behalf
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Peggy_Moriatis@timeinc.com [mailto:Peggy_Moriatis@timeinc.com] 
Posted At: Monday, June 12, 2006 1:09 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [ADMINS] URGENT SECOND DMCA Notice of
re.http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ sent on behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore
Subject: FW: [ADMINS] URGENT SECOND DMCA Notice of
re.http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ sent on behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore




 
Peggy S. Moriatis
Time Inc.
1271 Avenue of the Americas
New York, New York 10020
Office: (212) 522-8040


-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Carter [mailto:rcarter@theplanet.com]
Sent: Monday, June 12, 2006 2:07 PM
To: Moriatis, Peggy - Time Inc. Law Department
<peggy_moriatis@timeinc.com>; Admins; abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: Jollymore, Nick - Time Inc. Law Department
<nicholas_jollymore@timeinc.com>
Subject: RE: [ADMINS] URGENT SECOND DMCA Notice of
re.http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ sent on behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore


http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copyright.html 

> -----Original Message-----
> From: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
> [mailto:planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf 
> Of Peggy_Moriatis@timeinc.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2006 1:32 PM
> To: Admins; abuse@theplanet.com
> Cc: nicholas_jollymore@timeinc.com
> Subject: [ADMINS] URGENT SECOND DMCA Notice of 
> re.http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ sent on behalf of Nicholas J. 
> Jollymore
> 
> DMCA Copyright Infringement
> 
> Dear ISP:
> 
> I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of
> PEOPLE Magazine.  This will put you on notice of a copyright 
> infringement on a website hosted by Hollywood Rag.  
> 
> PEOPLE Magazine owns exclusive North American rights to the
> only photographs which have been taken to date of Angelina 
> Jolie and Brad Pitt and their newborn baby girl, Shiloh 
> Nouvel.  Six of these photographs that appear in PEOPLE 
> Magazine (the "Photographs") have been posted on the web 
> site, http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ in violation of PEOPLE 
> Magazine's exclusive rights and copyrights. 
> 
> This letter is an official notification under the provisions
> of Section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to 
> effect removal of this Copyright infringement.  I hereby 
> demand that you immediately (TODAY) issue a cancel message, 
> as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified postings and 
> prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web address, 
> from posting the infringing Photographs to your servers in 
> the future. Please be advised that by law, as a service 
> provider, you must "expeditiously remove or disable access 
> to" the infringing Photographs upon receiving this notice. 
> Noncompliance may result in a loss of the possibility of 
> immunity under the DMCA.
> 
> I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the
> manner complained of herein is not authorized by PEOPLE 
> Magazine, their respective licensing representatives, or the 
> law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best 
> of my knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury 
> that I am authorized to act on behalf of PEOPLE Magazine for 
> matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its 
> exclusive rights in its copyrighted material.
> 
> Please email me, or send to me at the address listed below, a
> prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to 
> resolve this matter.
> 
> Very truly yours,
> 
> Nicholas J. Jollymore
> 
> Deputy General Counsel
> 
> Time Inc.
> 
> 1271 Avenue of the Americas
> 
> New York, NY 10020
> 
> * (O) 212 522-3083
> 
> * (F) 212 467-0844
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> Peggy S. Moriatis
> 
> Time Inc.
> 
> 1271 Avenue of the Americas
> 
> New York, New York 10020
> 
> Office: (212) 522-8040
>
